title: Paragon Hard Disk Manager 14 Premium 10.1.21.471.022 All In One

Paragon Hard Disk Manager 14 Premium 10.1.21.471.022 All In One Package | 650 MB

This special package contains:

Paragon Hard Disk Manager 14 Premium - Windows Installation Package 32 Bit (English)_10.1.21.471_022  
Paragon Hard Disk Manager 14 Premium - Windows Installation Package 64 Bit (English)_10.1.21.471_022  
Paragon Hard Disk Manager 14 Premium - Boot Media Builder installation package (English)_10.1.21.471_001  
Paragon Scripting Language - User Manual (English)

Paragon Hard Disk Manager 14 Premium - Recovery Media Builder add-on 64 Bit (English)_10.1.21.471_007
Hard Disk Manager 14 Premium - User Manual (English)  

Features
Innovative backup imaging technology (pVHD, VHD, VMDK)
Seamless restore to dissimilar hardware (Adaptive RestoreÃ¢â€žÂ¢)
Supports both, physical and virtual hard drives
Differential and incremental backups
Cyclic Backup to VD for automating backup routines
Application-level excludes for Exchange, SQL, Sharepoint...
Live Windows system migrations (P2V, V2V, V2P, P2P)
Connect to virtual disks as if they were physical
Automatic partition alignment boosts storage performance
Advanced disk wiping algorithms and BitLocker support
Windows 8.1, Server 2012 R2 and GPT/uEFI support
Support for SSDs and AFDs (2TB+, non-512B sector size)
Comprehensive Linux and WinPE recovery environments*


Platform : Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 8.1
Language : English
